abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: implementation
            of a four-year highway maintenance program; preinvestment
            studies for improvement of the Ngozi-Muyinga-Kobero road;
            preparation of a master plan for further road development
            and additional feasibility studies; refinancing of Credit S11-BU.
